titles.title: Fort Frederica National Monument Boundary Expansion Act of 2014
To expand the boundary of Fort Frederica National Monument in the State of Georgia, and for other purposes.
Fort Frederica National Monument Boundary Expansion Act of 2014

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Lands and Environmental Regulation.

bill.summary: Fort Frederica National Monument Boundary Expansion Act of 2014 - Expands the boundary of the Fort Frederica National Monument on Saint Simon Island, Georgia. Increases the maximum number of acres that may be included in the monument from 250 to 525 acres.
